name: Inner Image Zoom
description: The Inner Image Zoom component allows the user to apply an image zoom effect inside that image in the application.

properties.name: source
properties.label: URL
properties.settingTooltip: Choose the image source to zoom
properties.handlerDescription: The logic to determine the image source to zoom.

properties.name: zoomIn
properties.label: Zoom
properties.settingTooltip: Select zoom in percent(%) to enlarge the image.

eventHandlers.name: onMouseMove
eventHandlers.label: On Mouse Move Event
eventHandlers.handlerDescription: This event is fired when the user moves the mouse over or touches the image.

eventHandlers.name: onMouseOver
eventHandlers.label: On Mouse Over Event
eventHandlers.handlerDescription: This event is fired when the mouse pointer hovers over the image.

eventHandlers.name: onMouseOut
eventHandlers.label: On Mouse Out Event
eventHandlers.handlerDescription: This event is fired when the mouse pointer leaves the image.
